overview: Five bulge popping college jocks play out your wrestling club fantasies! Led by tall and meaty Shane, the Mat Brats temper their testosterone every weekend in a series of old school matches with down and dirty twists. Drawing names from a hat, they pair up, each winner drawing a new name, until someone loses three times. This particular week the loser gets doused in cum from a group jerk off! Did we mention the ritual of sensually oiling each other up before each match? Wanna join?
title: Mat Brats
